# ListExtensions.IsValidIndex&lt;T&gt; method

Determines if specified value is a valid index in list

```csharp
public static bool IsValidIndex<T>(this IList<T> items, int index)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Type element |
| items | Target list |
| index | Value to test |

## Return Value

true if is a valid index; otherwise false.
